venue.address_2: 1 Mile West of the Hairpin Turn
venue.name: Greeley Ponds Trailhead

item.description: I will update this listing later tonight but wanted to get it out there so people can plan their weekend. We will leave from the Greely Pond Trailhead and hike about 7.5 miles round trip and climb about 3,500 feet. It is still winter in the mountains so snow shoes and some form of traction will be required. Could also be some good sledding so bring one of those too.
item.how_to_find_us: white toyota highlander with ma plates and a meetup sign in the window
item.why: Have done them in summer and in winter so now its time to do them in spring.
item.name: Osceola and East Osceola
